code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='/api/persons';var getAll=function getAll(){return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var create=function create(newPhone){return axios.post(baseUrl,newPhone).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var update=function update(id,newPhone){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newPhone).then(function(res){return res.data;});};var deleteNumber=function deleteNumber(id){return axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id)).then(function(res){return res;});};var phoneService={getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deleteNumber:deleteNumber};export default phoneService;
